concept: MCQs on race conditions, critical section and properties.

challenges.title: Q1: Race Condition
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Two processes use different variables
b) Final result depends on the order of execution of processes
c) Only one process is running in the system
d) Processes are in blocked state
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: Critical Section Requirement
challenges.description: Which of the following is NOT a requirement of a good critical section solution?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Mutual exclusion
b) Progress
c) Bounded waiting
d) Maximum CPU utilization
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
